dialog.text: Ella, we just recieved a request for help at the Georgia Aquarium. The majority of the fish in the salt water aquarium are gathering towards the surface of the water. Grab your geer and meet Mr. Yhoshi at the saltwater exibit.
Hi, you must be Mr. Yoshi. I'm Ella from The Elite Detective Squad.
Thank you for getting here so quickly. I noticed last night that the fish are gathering at the surface of the water.

clues.text: The majority of the fish seem to be floating or swimming slowly.
clues.question: Why would fish float instead of swim?

answers.text: It is normal for the majority of the fish to display these characteristics.
The fish were overfed and have to wait until the food digests to swim normally again.

clues.hint: Fish are similar to humans in this instance and tend to slow down for the same reason.

clues.text: The majority of the fish are near the surface of the water, some with their mouths open
clues.question: What causes saltwater fish to float near the surface of the water?

answers.text: The fish are cold and float closer to the surface for the warmth of the sun.
The fish are hungry and are waiting for food.
The fish are looking for oxygen.

clues.hint: The fact that their mouths are open indicates that they are gasping for something.

clues.text: There majority of the fish are brightly colored.
clues.question: Why are the majority of the fish brightly colored?

answers.text: The bright colors allow the fish to blend in with their environment.
The colors of the fish intensify when they are kept in captivity.
The fish aren't brightly colored, it is an illusion caused by the reflection of the tank light.

clues.hint: This is used to protect the fish from predators.

clues.text: Many of the fish have torn or jagged fins.
clues.question: Why would the fish have jagged or torn fins?

answers.text: These are the male fish that have battled with the other males to establish dominance.
Ammonia levels of the tank are above 1-2 ppm.
The fish were born with this abnormality.

clues.hint: The environment affects the physical attributes of the fish.

dialog.text: Ella, use the seach tool to find clues.
